title: STEM-Based Social Science Problem-Solving Process through Collaborative Problem Solving

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Social Science Concepts and Digital Tool Utilization Skills
context.additional_context: Small-group activity-centered course utilizing mobile devices and collaboration tools in a BYOD environment, with continuous monitoring of learning outcomes and feedback provision through formative assessment

learning_goals: Design collaborative strategies applying STEM techniques (systems thinking, data analysis, etc.) to solve social problems
Perform real-time idea sharing and decision-making processes with distributed team members using mobile platforms
Evaluate and adjust cognitive/social strategies contributed by learners from diverse backgrounds through collective intelligence analysis
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
